scripts.demo: npm run install && npm run start
scripts.install: npm run install:cars & npm run install:bank & npm run install:auth
scripts.install:auth: npm run install:auth:backend &  npm run install:auth:frontend & npm run install:users:frontend
scripts.install:bank: npm run install:bank:backend & npm run install:bank:frontend
scripts.install:cars: npm run install:cars:backend & npm run install:cars:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:cars & npm run start:bank & npm run start:auth
scripts.start:auth: npm run start:auth:backend &  npm run start:auth:frontend & npm run start:users:frontend
scripts.start:bank: npm run start:bank:backend & npm run start:bank:frontend
scripts.start:cars: npm run start:cars:backend & npm run start:cars:frontend
